SELECT ta.id AS id, ta.announcement_title AS announcementTitle, ta.annex_name AS annexName, ta.view_num AS viewNum, ta.publish_range AS publishRange, ta.create_time AS createTime, ta.create_by AS createBy, ta.user_name AS creator FROM t_announcement ta where 1=1
AND ta.announcement_title like concat(concat('%',#{announcementTitle}),'%')
AND ta.user_name like concat(concat('%',#{creator}),'%')
AND ta.create_time >= to_date(#{beginDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND ta.create_time <= to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
order by ta.create_time

SELECT ta.id AS id, ta.announcement_title AS announcementTitle, ta.annex_name AS annexName, ta.view_num AS viewNum, ta.publish_range AS publishRange, ta.create_time AS createTime, ta.create_by AS createBy, ta.user_name AS creator FROM t_announcement ta where 1=1
AND ta.announcement_title like concat(concat('%',#{announcementTitle}),'%')
AND ta.user_name like concat(concat('%',#{creator}),'%')
AND ta.create_time >= to_date(#{beginDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND ta.create_time <= to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and rownum < 11 order by ta.create_time desc

announcement_title = #{announcementTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
publish_range = #{publishRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
announcement_content = #{announcementContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
annex_name = #{annexName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
annex_url = #{annexUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
view_num = #{viewNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from t_announcement t where t.id=#{id}
